source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TOP 2 SiteCode FROM dbo.DEX_Site_Config  WHERE SiteCode  LIKE'%US%' OR SiteCode LIKE'%UK%'

additionalHeaders.value:
Content-Type:@{activity('Get Service Config').output.firstRow.ContentType}
soapAction:@{activity('Get Service Config').output.firstRow.SoapAction}

activities.name: Check If Record Is Array
activities.description:
if record is array -> pass value as it is
else -> create array of that single record 
            and pass

activities.name: Filter Empty Record
activities.description:
Check If empty record exists in MessageAcknowledgement 
then FilteredMessageAcknowledgement will be empty otherwise it will be filled

activities.name: Set FilteredMessageAcknowledgement
activities.description: Fill the FilteredMessageAcknowledgement  Array after filtering the record

dependsOn.activity: Move FTP Shipment Files to Processed

activities.name: FTP Move WC Orders to Processed
Move FTP Shipment Files to Processed

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DI.InterfaceCode, DI.[Enabled], DI.[Type], DI.[Direction], DI.[FTPDropDir], DI.FTPProcessedDir 
FROM dbo.DEX_Interface DI
WHERE InterfaceCode = 'IBWCSO'

SELECT DI.InterfaceCode, DI.[Enabled], DI.[Type], DI.[Direction], DI.[FTPDropDir], DI.FTPProcessedDir 
FROM dbo.DEX_Interface DI
WHERE InterfaceCode = 'IBPDRSHIP'

dependsOn.activity: FTP Move WC Orders to Processed

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: For Each File
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

activities.name: Copy A File
activities.description: Copy a file from the source store to the destination store.

activities.name: Filter Files
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

ifFalseActivities.name: Load In Process File From BS

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [MessageID]
	 , [Direction]
      ,[SiteCode]
      ,[MessageDate]
      ,[MessageType]
      ,[CreatedOn]
      ,[Exported]
      ,[ExportedOn]
      ,[LastUpdatedOn]
      ,[FileData]
      ,[FileName]
      ,[BCMessageID]
  FROM [dbo].[DEX_Interface_Document]
  WHERE Direction = 'Inbound' AND Exported = 0

additionalHeaders.value:
Content-Type:@{activity('Get Service Config').output.firstRow.ContentType}
soapAction:@{activity('Get Service Config').output.firstRow.SoapAction}

requestBody.value:
@{concat('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
    <soap:Body>
        <CreateMessage xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-schemas/codeunit/MessageMgmt">
            <xMLData>
                <MessageAcknowledgement xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-nav/xmlports/x52000">
                    <Id/>
                    <MessageType>',

            item().MessageType 
,'</MessageType>
                    <Direction>Inbound</Direction>
                    <Payload>
                        <![CDATA[ ',

            item().FileData 
,'
                           ]]>
					
                    </Payload>
                    <Status>Unprocessed</Status>
                    <ExternalRefID>
                    <![CDATA[ ',

            item().MessageID
,'
                           ]]> 
                   </ExternalRefID>
                  <SiteCode>
                  <![CDATA[ ',

            item().SiteCode
,'
                           ]]> 
               </SiteCode>
                </MessageAcknowledgement>
            </xMLData>
        </CreateMessage>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: select InterfaceCode from Dex_Interface  WHERE [Enabled] = 1 and [Direction] = 'Outbound'

SELECT TOP 1000
		MessageID, SiteCode, MessageType, FileData,InterfaceCode
	FROM 
		DEX_Interface_Document 
	WHERE 
		Direction = 'Outbound'  and Exported = 0 and InterfaceCode= '@{pipeline().parameters.InterfaceCode}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT SiteCode,MessageID,BCMessageID  FROM [dbo].[DEX_Interface_Document] 
WHERE ISNULL([ConfirmationSentToBC],0) = 0 AND Direction ='OutBound'
